Stop moving targets

For systems with interactive elements that require accuracy, people may need to stop interactive elements from moving.

Comment on this item

Mappings

Required abilityAccessibility characteristicSupport needed
Fine motor controlInaccuracyAdjust
MobilityInaccuracyAdjust
StaminaInaccuracyAdjust

References

  • Reference: Make interactive elements that require accuracy (eg. cursor/touch controlled menu options) stationary

Tags

  • physical
